00051 namespace sc_core {
00052 
00053 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 //  CLASS : sc_host_mutex
00055 //
00056 //   The sc_host_mutex class, wrapping an OS mutex on the simulation host
00057 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 
00059 class SC_API sc_host_mutex : public sc_mutex_if
00060 {
00061 #if SC_CPLUSPLUS >= 201103L
00062 
00063     typedef std::mutex underlying_type;
00064 
00065     void do_init()    { /* no-op */ }
00066     void do_lock()    { m_mtx.lock(); }
00067     bool do_trylock() { return m_mtx.try_lock(); }
00068     void do_unlock()  { m_mtx.unlock(); }
00069     void do_destroy() { /* no-op */ }
00070 
00071 #elif defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) // use CRITICAL_SECTION on Windows
00072 
00073     typedef CRITICAL_SECTION underlying_type;
00074 
00075     void do_init()    { InitializeCriticalSection( &m_mtx ); }
00076     void do_lock()    { EnterCriticalSection( &m_mtx ); }
00077     bool do_trylock() { return ( TryEnterCriticalSection( &m_mtx ) != 0 ); }
00078     void do_unlock()  { LeaveCriticalSection( &m_mtx ); }
00079     void do_destroy() { DeleteCriticalSection( &m_mtx ); }
00080 
00081 #else // use pthread mutex
00082 
00083 # if defined(__hpux)
00084 #   define SC_PTHREAD_NULL_ cma_c_null
00085 # else // !defined(__hpux)
00086 #   define SC_PTHREAD_NULL_ NULL
00087 # endif
00088 
00089     typedef pthread_mutex_t underlying_type;
00090 
00091     void do_init()    { pthread_mutex_init( &m_mtx, SC_PTHREAD_NULL_ ); }
00092     void do_lock()    { pthread_mutex_lock( &m_mtx ); }
00093 # ifdef _XOPEN_SOURCE
00094     bool do_trylock() { return ( pthread_mutex_trylock( &m_mtx ) == 0 ); }
00095 # else
00096     bool do_trylock() { return /* not supported */ false; }
00097 # endif
00098     void do_unlock()  { pthread_mutex_unlock( &m_mtx ); }
00099     void do_destroy() { pthread_mutex_destroy( &m_mtx ); }
00100 
00101 # undef SC_PTHREAD_NULL_
00102 
00103 #endif // platform-specific implementation
00104 
00105 public:
00106 
00107     // constructors and destructor
00108 
00109     sc_host_mutex() : m_mtx()
00110       { do_init(); }
00111     virtual ~sc_host_mutex()
00112       { do_destroy(); }
00113 
00114 
00115     // interface methods
00116 
00117     // blocks until mutex could be locked
00118     virtual int lock()
00119       { do_lock(); return 0; }
00120 
00121     // returns -1 if mutex could not be locked
00122     virtual int trylock()
00123       { return do_trylock() ? 0 : -1; }
00124 
00125     // should return -1 if mutex was not locked by caller,
00126     // but is not yet able to check this
00127     virtual int unlock()
00128       { do_unlock(); return 0; }
00129 
00130 private:
00131     underlying_type m_mtx;
00132 };
00133 
00134 } // namespace sc_core
